name: BindMinds
description:
BindMinds is a small puzzle game made for the Bitter Jam, in wich we had to make a game in 60h with a very limited tileset (that's why there's no real text or animations).

WASD or arrows to move.

R to restart the current level.

thanks for playing! i'd appreciate the feedback, this is my first game jam, and my first really "finished" game.
